text: Is there a way to see page view data for dynamic pages?
Its there in Website Analytics section
the ying and the yang of avatars connected!

Hello all, I have a hubdb table `faqs` and another `faq_categories`
`faqs` have a column `faq_category_id` which is a foreign key pointing to the id of `faqs_categories`
Now when rendering the `faqs` with hubl, I can't seem to access the `name` column directly from loaded faqs.

Can anyone help me with the hubl I'm needing to achieve this ?
